FileHandler

Class RWFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileHandler.RWFile

  • public abstract class RWFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class responsible for handling streams of data. Methods use generic Object data types, so casting is necessary.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    André Dias (190221068) e Tomás Barroso (190221029)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RWFile() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Object loadData(java.lang.String fileNamePath)
      Static method that handles the de-serialization and stream of any .bin data into an object.
      static void printToFile(java.lang.String fileNamePath, java.lang.String textToSave)
      Static method that handles the creation of a text file (*.txt), with the desired content.
      static void saveData(java.lang.String fileNamePath, java.lang.Object obj)
      Static method that handles the serialization and stream of any object's data into a .bin file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RWFile

        public RWFile()

    • Method Detail

      • printToFile

        public static void printToFile(java.lang.String fileNamePath,
                               java.lang.String textToSave)
        Static method that handles the creation of a text file (*.txt), with the desired content. Subsequent usages overrides the file (if said file already exists), and thus all of the previous content will be lost.
        Parameters:
        fileNamePath - Name of .txt file.
        textToSave - String content to save on .txt file.

      • saveData

        public static void saveData(java.lang.String fileNamePath,
                            java.lang.Object obj)
        Static method that handles the serialization and stream of any object's data into a .bin file. Subsequent usages overrides the file (if said file already exists), and thus all of the previous content will be lost.
        Parameters:
        fileNamePath - Name of .bin file.
        obj - Object to save.

      • loadData

        public static java.lang.Object loadData(java.lang.String fileNamePath)
        Static method that handles the de-serialization and stream of any .bin data into an object.
        Parameters:
        fileNamePath - Name of .bin file to search.
